item.title: 4 Reasons Why Curiosity is Important and How to Develop It
item.description:
4 Reasons Why Curiosity is Important and How to Develop It

The important thing is not to stop questioning... Never lose a holy curiosity. Albert Einstein Curiosity is an important trait of a genius. I don't think you can find an intellectual giant who is not a curious person. Thomas Edison, Leonardo da Vinci, Albert Einstein, Richard Feynman, they are all curious characters.

item.title: Seth's Blog
item.description:
Seth's Blog

Should the person who runs the customer service operations at a ski school also be required to love skiing? Can the CFO of a large church be an atheist? Does the head of marketing at Kodak have to have a passion for chemicals? It's true, "write what you know, write what you love."
